value.string: Its a master bot which integrates all the other subbots
Read all config files and call all the subbots.
In case of failure while finding/entering to a field, ERROR flag will be raised and BOT will be stopped

Hi Team,

Started the processing! 

Thanks, 
Email Branding Validation BOT
